explains: adj. 有破坏性的，损害的；诽谤的
v. 破坏（damage 的现在分词形式）；损害
wordGroup: serious damage 严重损害；严重损坏
brain damage 脑损伤
formation damage 地层损害，油层损害；生产层损坏
fatigue damage 疲劳损伤；疲劳损坏
structural damage 结构损伤
environmental damage 环境损害；破坏环境
damage mechanics 损伤力学
liver damage 肝损伤
property damage 财产损失；财产损害
cause damage to 对…造成损坏，带来损害
damage threshold 损伤阈值，损坏阈
fire damage 火灾损失
water damage 水渍
damage assessment 损坏情况估计
earthquake damage 地震破坏；地震损害
physical damage 有形损坏；物理性损坏；机械损坏
tissue damage 组织损伤
mechanical damage 机械损伤；硬伤
damage control 损害控制；破坏性控制
permanent damage 永久损伤

sentences.en: Lead is potentially damaging to children's health.
sentences.cn: 铅对儿童的健康具有潜在损害。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the rug without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不损坏它是不可能的。

sentences.en: The broadscale cutting down of trees is damaging the environment.
sentences.cn: 对树木的大规模砍伐正在破坏环境。
